course_description: This course provides a gentle introduction to using Tableau Desktop for creating data visualizations and dashboards. Students will learn the basics of using Tableau, including navigating the interface, connecting to data sets, creating charts, and creating dashboards. We will also dive deeper into some of the essential skills needed to take your Tableau visualizations to the next level and learn how to create several common chart types in Tableau. Students will build two interactive dashboards and several data visualizations. This course is a first step into mastering Tableau that will prepare students for using Tableau more extensively in future courses.
